text:
@CountryOverPar5 @RobAnderson2018 Mayors in other cities have made calls to reduce 'meeting points'

In some cases GOP Governors have used exec orders to fight closures

In Flagstaff yesterday the Mayor closed salons in violation of @dougducey exec order

Will the AG file suit?

https://t.co/JMvVAdag8x
